_doc: Persistent hypothesis queue. Hypotheses move from untested → tested (validated/rejected). Check here before generating new hypotheses.

hypotheses.summary: AR Physical payload doesn't benefit from Fiery Demise — prioritize fire-school during Brand
hypotheses.resultDetail: Mean +0.108% but worst -1.063%. Fails worst-build criterion. SoulCarver Anni builds hurt by reordering — empowered cycle timing interacts with Soul Carver fragment generation.
hypotheses.mechanism: Fiery Demise amplifies fire damage during Fiery Brand. AR empowerment payload is physical (Reaver's Glaive strikes). Prioritizing fire-school abilities during Brand window may yield higher total damage.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Reorder ar_brand_window to prioritize fire abilities over empowerment triggers

hypotheses.summary: Cast Spirit Bomb before burst windows to apply Frailty debuff
hypotheses.resultDetail: Mean +0.049%, worst -0.902%. Universal gain across both hero trees. Near noise at quick fidelity — needs confirm validation.
hypotheses.mechanism: Spirit Bomb applies Frailty debuff (damage taken increase). Casting before burst window ensures all subsequent damage is amplified. Current APL doesn't sequence Spirit Bomb relative to burst windows.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Add Spirit Bomb priority before major cooldown sequences

hypotheses.summary: Pool fury to 60+ before Meta activation
hypotheses.resultDetail: Mean -0.121%, worst -1.529%. Adding fury>=60 on top of fragment guard makes the delay too long. AR -0.334% hurt by excessive Meta delay.
hypotheses.mechanism: Metamorphosis increases Fracture fragment generation. Having fury available immediately allows instant fragment generation for Spirit Bomb combos. Current APL doesn't pool before Meta.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Add fury>=60 guard to Meta activation condition

hypotheses.summary: Pool fragments before Meta to maximize Untethered Rage procs
hypotheses.resultDetail: Both-tree: mean -0.143%, worst -1.489% (rejected — Anni -0.590%). AR-only: mean +0.177%, worst -0.554% (accepted — AR +0.454%, Anni neutral -0.089%). Fragment readiness enables instant SBomb→Fracture(3)→SBomb chain.
hypotheses.mechanism: Untethered Rage procs from fragment consumption during Meta. Having fragments ready at Meta start maximizes proc opportunities in the extended Meta window.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Add soul_fragments>=3 guard to Meta activation

hypotheses.summary: Remove Sigil of Spite fragment guard in single target for more AotG procs
hypotheses.resultDetail: Mean -0.190%, worst -1.398%. Fragment waste when Spite fires at high frag counts pushes past cap and wastes future Fracture generation.
hypotheses.mechanism: Sigil of Spite has soul_fragments<=3 guard to prevent fragment overflow. In ST, fragments are abundant so the guard may be too conservative. Relaxing allows more Spite casts and AotG procs.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Add active_enemies=1 bypass to Spite fragment guard

hypotheses.summary: SBomb→Soul Carver→SBomb sandwich during early Meta for Anni
hypotheses.resultDetail: Mean -0.063%, worst -0.782%. The existing priority ordering already naturally produces the burst sequence. Explicit sub-list adds overhead without benefit.
hypotheses.mechanism: Discord theorycraft suggests deliberate SBomb→Soul Carver→SBomb sequence during Meta opener for maximum fragment throughput in Annihilator builds.
hypotheses.proposedChange: Create anni_meta_burst sub-list called during early Meta (remains>12s)
